force:cmdt:create.description: Creates a new custom metadata type in the current project
examples: $ sfdx force:cmdt:create --typename MyCustomType --label "Custom Type" --plurallabel "Custom Types" --visibility Public

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

typename.name: typename
typename.description: Object Name for the custom metadata type

label.name: label
label.description: Label for the custom metadata type

plurallabel.name: plurallabel
plurallabel.description: Plural label for the custom metadata type. If blank, uses label

visibility.name: visibility
visibility.description: Visibility for the type. Valid values are 'Public' and 'Protected'. If blank, uses Public

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: The directory to store the newly created files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.

force:cmdt:generate.description: generates a custom metadata type and all its records for the provided sobject
examples: "$ sfdx force:cmdt:generate --devname MyCMDT --sobjectname MySourceObject__c  --ignoreunsupported --sourceusername 'alias or the email of the source org'
"$ sfdx force:cmdt:generate --devname MyCMDT --label 'My CMDT' --plurallabel 'My CMDTs' --sobjectname SourceCustomSetting__c  --visibility Protected
"$ sfdx force:cmdt:generate --devname MyCMDT --sobjectname SourceCustomSetting__c  --typeoutputdir 'your desired Path for custom metadata'
"$ sfdx force:cmdt:generate --devname MyCMDT --sobjectname SourceCustomSetting__c  --recordsoutputdir 'your desired Path for custom metadata Records'

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

devname.name: devname
devname.description: The name of the new custom metadata type.

label.name: label
label.description: Label for the custom metadata type

plurallabel.name: plurallabel
plurallabel.description: Plural label for the custom metadata type. If blank, uses label

visibility.name: visibility
visibility.description: Visibility for the type. Valid values are 'Public' and 'Protected'. If blank, uses 'Public'

sobjectname.name: sobjectname
sobjectname.description: The API Name of the sObject you are generating to Custommetadata

sourceusername.name: sourceusername
sourceusername.description: username or alias for the source org that contains the Custom Setting or SObject and data to be generateed

ignoreunsupported.name: ignoreunsupported
ignoreunsupported.description: Flag to ignore non-supported field types (these fields will not be created). Default is to create text fields and convert source to text.

typeoutputdir.name: typeoutputdir
typeoutputdir.description: Specify the directory where the custom metadata will be created (default is 'force-app/main/default/objects')

recordsoutputdir.name: recordsoutputdir
recordsoutputdir.description: Specify the directory where the custom metadata will be created (default is 'force-app/main/default/customMetadata')

force:cmdt:field:create.description: generates a custom metadata field based on the field type provided

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

picklistvalues.name: picklistvalues
picklistvalues.description: List of picklist values that are added when creating a picklist

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: The directory to store the newly created files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.

force:cmdt:record:create.description: creates a new record for a given custom metadata type in the current project
examples: $ sfdx force:cmdt:create --typename MyCMT__mdt --recname MyRecord My_Custom_Field_1=Foo My_Custom_Field_2=Bar
$ sfdx force:cmdt:create --typename MyCMT__mdt --recname MyRecord --label "My Record" --protected true My_Custom_Field_1=Foo My_Custom_Field_2=Bar

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

typename.name: typename
typename.description: API Name of the custom metadata type to create a record for

protection.name: protection
protection.description: Visibility for the record. Valid values are 'true' and 'false'.  If blank, uses false.

inputdir.name: inputdir
inputdir.description: Specify the directory where the custom metadata type definition will be pulled from (default is 'force-app/main/default/objects')

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: Specify the directory where the file will be created (default is 'force-app/main/default/customMetadata')

force:cmdt:record:insert.description: creates new custom Metadata type records from a CSV

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

typename.name: typename
typename.description: API Name of the custom metadata type

inputdir.name: inputdir
inputdir.description: Specify the directory where the custom metadata type definition will be pulled from (default is 'force-app/main/default/objects')

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: Specify the directory where the file will be created (default is 'force-app/main/default/customMetadata')

namecolumn.name: namecolumn
namecolumn.description: Column that is used to determine the name of the record. Defaults to Name
